full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GIS MDOS GLUD ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS LA MDOS GLUD 'BUL TSUL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA'I SKUG GZHOGS GRVA TSANG PHAN BDE GSANG SNGAGS GLING GI BSRID KYI BLO RIG DANG LDAN DI MCHI AER TE NI TZAS SAN BSKAL BZANG DGE LEGS DANG, ,JANG JONG CHEN WANG GI MNGA' 'BANGS GSO RTZIS KYI BLO RIG PAS BRGYAN PA DMI CHI BLO BZANG NGAG DBANG ZHES BYA BA GNYIS KA NAN TAN CHEN POS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG BSKUL BA'I NGO KHREL DU, ,BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED RJE DZA YA PAndI TA MTSAN GZHAN BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA'I THA SHAL BA, NYON MONGS KYI THAN DU GYUR BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON ZHES BGYI BAS SBYAR BA'I DE NI YIS GNAS BSKABS DANG THAR THUG GI 'GAL RKYEN PAR CHOD @006B KUN SEL ZHING RGYAL BA'I GO 'PHANG THOB PA'I GU RU BSNGO, ,DGE'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
